[Reforging Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=542)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 6,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This [steel shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=3) contains a smoldering core of magma that never cools. Whenever the _reforging shield’s_ current Hit Points are below its Break Threshold, the shield recovers 5 Hit Points at the start of its wielder’s turn each round until it is no longer [broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2). Each time a character [Repairs](/Actions.aspx?ID=42) the shield, the shield recovers double the number of Hit Points. The shield has Hardness 15, HP 120, and BT 60.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
